description: [Emotet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0367) has maintained persistence through a scheduled task, e.g. though a .dll file in the Registry.(Citation: US-CERT Emotet Jul 2018)(Citation: emotet_hc3_nov2023)

external_references.description: Office of Information Security, Health Sector Cybersecurity Coordination Center. (2023, November 16). Emotet Malware: The Enduring and Persistent Threat to the Health Sector. Retrieved June 19, 2024.
US-CERT. (2018, July 20). Alert (TA18-201A) Emotet Malware. Retrieved March 25, 2019.
